message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split, so we both benefit from this game.

I'd like to propose a 65/35 split in my favor.  While it's not exactly a 50/50 split, it's a fairer reflection of the fact that I'm risking more due to the inflation.  We can both still come out ahead.
Bob, my offer was already generous.  Your proposal doesn't reflect the pace at which my potential gains decrease. Let's settle this â€“ 55/45.
